title: Client Issues
body:
So my past few weeks of playing I have had an on and off crashing problem with league when in champ select. I am sick and tired of how awful your client is riot I have lost 2 games worth of LP and multiple 30+ minute wait times. I repaired it and I just encountered the problem once again. Would be awesome if i could get an explanation on a way to fix it from someone who had the same problem or something similar.

Thanks

replies.body: What do you mean exactly by crashing?  Are you receiving any errors?  In the meantime, if you are using any apps like play.tv I recommend removing them all as they've been known to shut the client down.  Let me know!

ok so i went through and really read all that and tried a lot of things and the client is still crashing every once in a while... just says its stopped working and isnt responding and i have to close the client out and restart it... its really weird but it happens to everyone around my area that i play with so i dont think its my connection or anything i have play.tv but not everyone that its happening to does... so i dont think its that, but removed it any ways... yeah sorry for the late response...

and it only happens during champ select

Middle of champselect the client will freeze and then a nice big white box will show up saying lolclient.exe has stopped working. It`s happened to me and it`s happened to friends. i don`t use any apps i usually only have league open with teamspeak and even then it still happens on my occasional skype escapades. it isn`t like I am going into eversingle champ select that it happens, but it happens enough that I think it should be brought up.

It sounds like you're losing connection in champion select and getting kicked off.  I suggest following the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out any possibilities with your network and resolve this.  Let me know if you have any questions!

CS:Go? Runs fine
SCII? runs fine
Heroes and generals? Runs fine
borderlands series online? runs fine
path of exile? Runs fine

League of legends? Leaverbuster right now because of actual client crashes, lost 80 lp in the last two weeks due to crippling lag and disconnects, I have never rage quit.. Im that guy who if im lagging too much might go stack a tear and safely farm jg with a gp/5 item if things go really bad connectionwise

i can run fallout 4 on my rig, i've repaired my client.

its not the router, the computer, the firewall crap.... ect

it's the client.

this game is now lag of legends
and now we're waiting another 5 minutes because someone else's client crashed.... and he just reinstalled today {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

same problems... crashes during champ select pretty much exclusively. waiting 15 minutes right now for something that has happened on 4 different peoples accounts while we have been playing for 3 hours.... pretty ridiculous
